title: Consistency in league
body:
So League generally values consistency, but with the change of "Stealth" being split into "Invisibility" and "Stealth" we've ran into a bit of an issue.

The issue being that Invisibility is basically fully invisible except for a few edge cases, while stealth is revealed within a certain range.

And i just ran into an issue with invisibility for the simple fact that i thought i was covered but wasn't because of Lulu's E detecting me, and i was honestly so thrown i had to ask what gave vision on me (as talon).

Either make most abilities detect invisibility or remove all detection methods, because anything in between tends to lead to confusion, and if your playing against an edge case champion, you will almost definitely screw up at some point and be caught by these edge cases.

Hell it took me the good part of 30 minutes to even find out in the game, because it's only rare for lulu to have her E on me at any point.
